title: Stocking or sock suspenders
special_rules: When suspension done by a different device from the stocking, classify in  and lower groups.When suspension is integral with stocking classify in  and lower groups.When stocking is adapted to allow separate garter to fasten, class in  and  and lower groups and also as additional information in .Comprises garter belts.For stocking or socks supports other than suspenders, classify in .If girdle is further used to support stocking or socks, classify also as additional information in .When girdle is used to support trouser or skirt, classify in  and lower groups.When girdle is used to shape body, classify in  and lower groups.
glossary_of_terms: GarterA band worn round the leg, either above or below the knee, to keep the stocking from falling down.Garter beltA suspender-belt
